author: sbarns
title: TV host Jenny Scordamaglia famous for nipple slip blunders dons outrageously see-through dress – WITHOUT a bra
text:
Comments SHE’S notorious for her outrageously daring wardrobe choices. 
But Jenny Scordamaglia, 28, has taken her bold dress sense to new heights by presenting her raunchy online entertainment channel in a completely see-through dress. YouTube 4 Jenny Scordamaglia flashed the flesh in a see-through netted dress 
The blonde bombshell, who is based in Florida, appeared at ease as she hosted Miami TV in the tight-fitting electric blue netted ensemble. 
Doing what she does best, Jenny nonchalantly ignored the fact she was wearing a transparent outfit and casually chatted away to the camera. 
The YouTube video, which has racked up over 700,000 views, has caused a stir online. Jenny Scordamaglia presents TV show in outrageously see-through netted dress YouTube 4 Jenny is notorious for donning a variety of risque looks 
“She is a smokin’ hot woman!!” commented one social media user, while another added: “OMG what a stunning woman.” 
Another contributor questioned: “She isn’t wearing any knickers is she?!” 
Former model Jenny launched her channel in 2007 and carved a niche for herself by presenting the show in a variety of provocative outfits. Related Stories Meet Yanet García, the world's sexiest weather girl and Instagram sensation EXPECTING A COLD FRONT ‘World’s sexiest weather girl’ Yanet Garcia sizzles in stunning lingerie for hot new video Sheep thrills Weather girl tries to milk a goat on live TV... and ends up flashing her boobs instead Fitness first Now the 'world's sexiest weather girl' is showing off her gym technique on Instagram what a hero! Weather girl suffers an embarrassing nipple slip in racy Wonder Woman costume YouTube 4 Jenny has previously hit out at trolls who slammed her provocative wardrobe 
She has previously turned heads in a plunging orange maxi dress and a black lace halter neck top. 
Jenny has previously shot down trolls who say she flashes too much flesh. 
“I mean, it’s just a body,” she said. “It’s just anatomy. These are just nipples.” 
But Jenny isn’t the only starlet who has flaunted her bod.
